summary: The military services sometimes divert servicemembers from their assigned units to perform other duties such as base security, fire and rescue, and running the gym or cafeteria. We looked at this borrowing of military personnel and its impact on military missions. The Defense Department, Army, Navy, and Air Force do not centrally track this practice. DOD and Army officials said they don't need to do...
title: Military Personnel: Perspectives on DOD's and the Military Services' Use of Borrowed Military Personnel
